proposal: Hey there, ASF community! With 8,400 committers and 320 active projects, you guys are like the bustling city of the open-source world. Imagine adding a DEX or a blockchain-based lottery to your cityscape. It's not just about coding, it's about creating new revenue streams. Congrats on your 2 ETH network holders, by the way. Let's make it 2,000, shall we?
